name: American Airlines A319 Business First
description:
Even pets prefer American Airlines.  

The Americans call it First Class, we call it Business Class.  Either way it's the big seats up the front of the plane.  Join me as I fly from St Louis to LA on an American Airlines A319.   

This flight review video covers boarding, taxi, take off and the American Airlines inflight product including the seat and dining. 

For more videos check out my channel where you'll find a range of airlines reviews in economy, business and first class including Emirates, British Airways, Etihad, Qatar, Qantas, Cathay Pacific, Singapore Airlines, LATAM, Baltic Air, Turkish Airlines and more

Route:   St Louis to Los Angeles AA707
When:    July 2017
Aircraft:  Airbus A319   registration N817AW
Seat:       2A
Camera:  Sony FDR-AXP55
